page.title: 04Kirkconnel: Social Work Dept
page.content: An integral part of the community's life,the Social Work Dept's.team of 4 full-time and 4 part-time social workers currently carry 82 long-term cases.The bulk of this work is in providing support for the many elderly persons in the area. The population is ageing due to the young moving out to seek employment. While there is not much alcoholism many of the cases are alcohol-related. Work with the{Mentally handicapped}is based in the Occupational Centre which currently caters for 24 students,8 of whom live with-in the block. Requests from Courts and Children's Panel for background reports run on average at 4 per month.Troublesome youngsters are predominantly affected by peer-group pressure which is so strong that it operates as a{ {sub-culture.}
